Object.Table: select TABLE_NAME ID,TABLE_NAME Name from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_TYPE='TABLE'
Object.View: select TABLE_NAME ID,TABLE_NAME Name from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE 1!=1
Object.StoredProcedure: select TABLE_NAME ID,TABLE_NAME Name from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE 1!=1

Property.Table: SELECT a.COLUMN_NAME [Name], a.DATA_TYPE + (CASE WHEN a.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH IS NULL THEN '' WHEN a.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH >=0 THEN '('+CONVERT(nvarchar,a.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH)+')' ELSE '(MAX)' END) [Type], (CASE WHEN b.CONSTRAINT_NAME IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) [IsKey], '' [Note], a.COLUMN_DEFAULT [Default] FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS a LEFT JOIN INFORMATION_SCHEMA.KEY_COLUMN_USAGE b on b.TABLE_NAME=a.TABLE_NAME AND b.COLUMN_NAME=a.COLUMN_NAME WHERE a.TABLE_NAME='{NAME}' AND (b.CONSTRAINT_NAME IS NULL OR b.CONSTRAINT_NAME NOT LIKE 'PK_%')
